snippet: The policeman, who had been guarding a ministry, opened fire on coalition troops, who fired back and fatally wounded him, the Afghan government said.
abstract: Afghan government reports police officer shot by NATO coalition soldier dies after apparent initiating insider attack on soldiers.
lead_paragraph: The policeman, who had been guarding a ministry, opened fire on coalition troops, who fired back and fatally wounded him, the Afghan government said.

headline.main: Afghan Policeman, Shot After Firing on NATO Soldiers, Dies of Wounds
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; Afghanistan: Policeman Dies of Wounds After Carrying Out Attack on Soldiers

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
